page.title: 15Community Centres in Stone
page.content: The old St. Michael's C.E. Primary School has been refurbished to provide a new community centre called the Frank Jordan Centre.It contains four rooms for public hire plus display areas and four glass display cabinets.The rooms are used regularly by various organisations and are also available for wedding receptions and parties. The Stone Youth and Community Centre is situated off Station Approach and is open to members from Stone and adjacent villages.Accommodation includes a sports hall, lounge, cafe area and covered verandah with a barbecue fireplace. At the Southern end of Stone is the Walton Community Centre which is the venue for several local clubs and associations.
